cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of influence maximization in social networks, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of social and information networks (cs.SI) and social and economic systems (cs.SOC). The proposed method involves designing a class of monotone submodular functions, which is a topic related to discrete mathematics and optimization (cs.DS). The method also involves using side-information in the form of categorical attribute values, which is a topic related to machine learning and data mining (cs.LG). Finally, the paper proposes an efficient approximate method for solving the problem, which is a topic related to artificial intelligence and optimization (cs.AI).
